Detailed Description

template<class eltype>
class YADimReduce< eltype >

General Base Class for Dimensionality Reduction.

Member Function Documentation

template<class eltype>
template<class mat_type>
void YADimReduce< eltype >::double_center (  YA_BaseT &  mat  ) 
 

Double center a matrix.

Center the matrix by substracting the mean of each column, row, adding the overall mean, and multiplying by -0.5 *

template<class eltype>
virtual int YADimReduce< eltype >::find (  const YA_MatT &  input,
YA_MatT &  output,
ya_sizet  dim,
EigenOptions &  eigopts
)  [pure virtual]
 

Find the map for reduction based on initial samples.

Parameters:
input Matrix storing initial samples (columns are dimensions)
output Matrix storing low-dimensioal mapping of samples
dim New dimensionality for output matrix *

Implemented in YAATEReduce< eltype >, YAIsoReduce< eltype >, YALLEReduce< eltype >, YAMDSReduce< eltype >, and YAPCAReduce< eltype >.

template<class eltype>
int YADimReduce< eltype >::load_map (  const string  filename  ) 
 

Load dimensionality reduction maps from the given file name.

Can generate the following errors:

  • 310/10 Improperly formatted reduction file

311/10 Reduction method does not match object type

  • 312/4 Version does not match current version *

template<class vm_type, class ya_type2>
int YADimReduce< eltype >::nbors_forward (  const vm_type &  in,
ya_type2 &  out
)  const
 

Perform forward map as a weighted average of k-neighbors.

The method used to determine the weights is set by neighbor_weight_mode()

Note:
the number of neighbors used is determined by neighbors() *

ya_type2 &  out
)  const
 

Perform reverse map as a weighted average of k-neighbors.

The method used to determine the weights is set by neighbor_weight_mode()

Note:
the number of neighbors used is determined by neighbors() *

template<class eltype>
void YADimReduce< eltype >::neighbor_mode (  ya_sizet  n  )  [inline]
 

Set the method for obtaining neighbors for LLE and IsoMap.

0 is nearest neighbors and 1 is epsilon The neighbor_mode is automatically set accordingly when using neighbors() or epsilon() *

template<class eltype>
ya_sizet YADimReduce< eltype >::neighbor_mode (   )  const [inline]
 

Get the method for obtaining neighbors for LLE and IsoMap.

0 is nearest neighbors and 1 is epsilon *

template<class eltype>
void YADimReduce< eltype >::neighbor_weight_mode (  const ya_sizet  t  )  [inline]
 

Set the method for obtaining weights in nbors_forward/nbors_reverse.

  • 0 : The weights are set as 1/distance to each neighbor and scaled to sum to 1
    • 1 : A least-squares problem is solved to optimize the weights as is performed in LLE
      See also:
      neighbor_weight_mode(), nbors_forward(), nbors_reverse() *

template<class eltype>
ya_sizet YADimReduce< eltype >::neighbor_weight_mode (   )  const [inline]
 

Get the method for obtaining weights in nbors_forward/nbors_reverse.

See also:
neighbor_weight_mode(), nbors_forward(), nbors_reverse() *

template<class eltype>
template<class ya_type1>
eltype YADimReduce< eltype >::reconstruct_error (  const ya_type1 &  input  )  const
 

RMSD representing the reconstruction error from the input matrix.

This is calculating by applying the forward map follwed by the reverse map. *

template<class eltype>
void YADimReduce< eltype >::verbose (  const int  v  )  [inline]
 

Set the degree of output to console by routines.

0 is no output, 1 outputs a progress meter, 2 also output nbor stats *
